original_text: Take ye heed every one of his neighbour, and trust ye not in any brother: for every brother will utterly supplant, and every neighbour will walk with slanders.
korean_text: 너희는 각기 이웃을 조심하며 어떤 형제든지 믿지 말라 형제마다 완전히 속이며 이웃마다 다니며 비방함이라

sentences.original_text: Take ye heed every one of his neighbour
and trust ye not in any brother
for every brother will utterly supplant
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 형제가 완전히 대적할 것이기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and every neighbour will walk with slanders
